We are here to help you! For information on the different parts of this app, touch any of the images below:
Profile
Before you can join a game, you will have to create a profile, and provide the required credentials.

A profile has to be created to join a game. You will be assigned a target after your profile has been created. Enter the necessary credentials required to create a profile. After you finalize your profile and join a session, you will not be allowed to change your information until the session is over.
Map
The Map page shows the location of your target. It updates and sends you your target\'s location every ten minutes.
The Map page shows the location of your target. It updates and sends you your target\'s location every ten minutes.
Standings
Standings shows who has been assassinated, and who is still in the game. Check to see who is dead, or is still alive
The Standings page shows players who are "alive" and "dead" in the current game session.
Join a game
You have to join a game if you want to play. Games already in session can not be joined but you can join upcoming games.
This page gives you information on current games in session, and game sessions that have not started yet. You cannot join a game in session, but you can join a session that has not started yet.
